00266 enum nrs_policy_flags {
00272         PTLRPC_NRS_FL_FALLBACK          = (1 << 0),
00276         PTLRPC_NRS_FL_REG_START         = (1 << 1),
00281         PTLRPC_NRS_FL_REG_EXTERN        = (1 << 2),
00282 };
00283 
00291 enum ptlrpc_nrs_queue_type {
00292         PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG    = (1 << 0),
00293         PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP     = (1 << 1),
00294         PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_BOTH   = (PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG | PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP)
00295 };

00379         unsigned                        nrs_throttling:1;
00380 };

00687 struct ptlrpc_nrs_request {

00713                 struct nrs_fifo_req     fifo;
00717                 struct nrs_crrn_req     crr;
00719                 struct nrs_orr_req      orr;
00723                 struct nrs_tbf_req      tbf;
00724         } nr_u;
00729         void                           *ext;
00730 };
